description.p: When a mortal bloodline is tainted with the essence of a powerful demon—whether through a pact, inheritance, or infernal experimentation—the result may be a Half-Demon. Agile, powerful, and often wrestling with their inner nature, Half-Demons walk the line between destruction and redemption.
Half-Demons share certain traits due to their demonic nature.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity or Strength score increases by 2, and your Charisma increases by 1.
Type. You are a Fiend in addition to your original type.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Demonic Resilience. You have resistance to fire damage and nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage while below half your hit points.

Demonic Surge. Once per short rest, you can activate your demonic power for 1 minute as a bonus action. You gain temporary hit points equal to your level, +10 feet movement speed, unarmed strikes deal 1d6 + modifier force damage, and you can make one additional weapon or unarmed attack as a bonus action. At 11th level, these attacks count as magical.

Fiendish Legacy. You know one cantrip from the Warlock spell list. At 3rd level, you can cast Hellish Rebuke once per long rest as a 2nd-level spell. At 5th level, you can cast Misty Step once per long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

Agile Devil. You are always under the effect of feather fall (no reaction required). You gain proficiency in the Acrobatics skill. Additionally, you can make standing jumps as though you had a 10-foot running start.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Infernal.
You have resistance to fire damage and nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage while below half your hit points.
